articles.title: Crumbling trust in American institutions: A MAHA activist takes on Girl Scout cookies : Planet Money - NPR
articles.description: A controversial study raised the specter that Girl Scout cookies are unsafe. Authorities say they are safe, but the whole saga highlights a breakdown of trust in American institutions.
articles.content:
It's been a great year for Zen Honeycutt and her grassroots advocacy group Moms Across America.
President Trump appointed Robert F. Kennedy Jr. a longtime ally and adviser to her organization to bec… [+16185 chars]
